summary.para: Note The IAMTunerNotification interface is deprecated.
The OnEvent method handles events from the TV tuner card.

param.name: Event
param.para: Flag identifying the type of event. Currently, the only value defined is AMTUNER_EVENT_CHANGED.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value that depends on the implementation of the interface.

summary.para: Note This callback interface has been deprecated, because the TV Tuner filter does not implement the callback mechanism.
